problem.markdown:
If you already have some core numerators, the WHO DQ Tool will automatically do what?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. Run DQ analysis (x) B. Configure some numerator relationships based upon WHO standards ( ) C. Complete all other configuration ( ) D. Nothing
[explanation] Configure some numerator relationships based upon WHO standards is correct. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: If you already have some core numerators, the WHO DQ Tool will automatically do what?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: B. Configure some numerator relationships based upon WHO standards

div.p: Configure some numerator relationships based upon WHO standards is correct.
